EmailTemplate.description: Email to send when 'Lead Management' Call (Training call 2) has been completed, site is Launched, but client has not completed Website Launch call
EmailTemplate.name: Final Training - No Website Launch Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Client_First_Name__c},
Now that your site is live, we'd like to review with you some of the more advanced features that were not previously available.
You really don't want to miss this session, so give us a call back at (888) 428-9659 as soon as you can so we can complete the session. We're available Monday-Friday, 8:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m. EST
If you haven't already, I would also encourage you to check out our online learning center and TORCHx 101 Webinar.
Access our Training Library here! http://torchx.freshdesk.com/support/home
Access the TORCHx 101 Webinar here! http://torchx.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/4000104378-torchx-101-webinar
Thank you for choosing TORCHx. We appreciate your business!
{!User.FirstName} TORCHx Support (888) 428-9659
